reviewText: Star of BORGEN: SEASON 1, Sidse Babett Knudsen plays the funny character of Rita in Fukssvansen, a comedy set around Christmastime involving two brothers. Sidse is excellent in her first class portrayal of Rita. We get to see some excellent facial expressions and body language from Sidse in the first half of this film. Supported by a decent cast including Anders W. Berthelsen Better Times ( Krniken ) ( Krnikan ) [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg. 0 Import - Denmark ], the film is sure to amuse any fans of a good comedy. Produced in 2001, the film is entirely in Danish with English subtitles throughout. For more Sidse, have a look at these other comedies Take the Trash ( Bl mnd ) [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg. 2 Import - Denmark ], Therapy ( Parterapi ) [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg. 2 Import - Denmark ] and Let's Get Lost which all prove Sidse's wonderful abilities with comedy. Enjoy!
